cancer.title: Cancer
cancer.info: Cancer is the general term for a group of several diseases. All of them root from uncontrolled cell replication, and many present with the formation of uncontrolled tissue masses known as tumors.

gallstones.title: Choledocholithiasis
gallstones.info: Choledocholithiasis is a term used to indicate the presence of gallstones, which are small lumps formed from bile inside the gallbladder.

common cold.title: The Common Cold
common cold.info: hi this is seth - take 40mg diphenhydramine hydrochloride, then throw back 6000IU vitamin D and 4000mg vitamin C before hitting the hay with a hot water bottle. Do that for three days, bam, you're fixed.

hangover.title: Veisalgia (Hangover)
hangover.info: Oh dude that's wicked i love that congrats ha ha

carbon monoxide poisoning.title: Carbon Monoxide Poisoning
carbon monoxide poisoning.info: Carbon monoxide poisoning affects judgement very quickly - get outside now and continue research.

dehydration.title: Dehydration
dehydration.info: Dehydration is a common cause of several minor medical affectations, such as headache, confusion, and tiredness. Drinking water should rectify this temporarily, but it is possible there is an underlying cause.

glaucoma.title: Glaucoma
glaucoma.info: Glaucoma is a disease of the eye that stems from increased pressure in the fluid within the eye. This causes damage to the retina, and causes permanent vision loss.

panic attack.title: Panic Attack
panic attack.info: Panic attacks are sudden-onset, brief outbursts of stress, panic, and other negative emotions.

stroke.title: Stroke
stroke.info: A stroke is a medical condition that causes brain cell death due to blood flow issues. This can be due to hemmoraghic bleeding, or lack of blood flow.

drug withdrawl.title: Drug Withdrawal
drug withdrawl.info: You hit that 50 nic too hard and now u finna dieeee

dust/pollution.title: Air Pollution
dust/pollution.info: The air? it is poison. Go to space and breathe space.

tumour.title: Tumour
tumour.info: Get a butterknife. You know what to do.

chickenpox.title: Chicken Pox
chickenpox.info: It's like cool graphic design on your body

chemotherapy.title: Chemotherapy
chemotherapy.info: If you are taking chemotherapy drugs, it is possible they are causing your symptoms. Consult your doctor.
